name.ja: <ruby>紅<rt>ぐ</rt></ruby><ruby>恋<rt>れん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>麗<rt>れい</rt></ruby><ruby>傑<rt>けつ</rt></ruby>－ブラダマンテ

text.en:
(This card is always treated as an "Infernoble Knight" card.)
You can discard this card, then target 1 Warrior monster you control; equip it with 1 appropriate Equip Spell from your Deck. When this card that is not equipped with any Equip Card is destroyed by battle with an opponent's monster and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, equip that monster your opponent controls to this card. You can only use each effect of "Brave Beauty of Ruby Regard - Bradamante" once per turn.
